CDC: Meningitis deaths linked to Mass. firm rise to 7

The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention today said the outbreak tied to a Framingham pharmacy has spread to more than 60 people. (AP, 4:46 p.m.)

Report: President Obama campaign outpacing Mitt Romney's in ads

A new report found that President Obama’s campaign has run more than twice as many TV ads in nine key states as has Mitt Romney's campaign. (AP, 4:03 p.m.)

(Wendy Maeda/Globe Staff)
